alert.note: Alert for Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 13 at 10:15AM EST until further notice by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina... Tar River At Greenville affecting Pitt County. For the Tar River...including Greenville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tar River at Greenville. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Widespread low land flooding adjacent to the river. Some farmland flooded across Pitt County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Saturday the stage was 12.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to a crest of 15.5 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps. The next statement will be issued by this evening at 900 PM EST.
